stocks.ai_explanation: TSM is a semiconductor manufacturer known for its server-grade processors. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
AMD is a semiconductor manufacturer focusing on CPUs and GPUs. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
ASML is a Dutch multinational corporation specializing in lithography machines used in semiconductor manufacturing. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
INTC is Intel Corporation, a major semiconductor manufacturer. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
QCOM is Qualcomm Incorporated, a semiconductor company. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

disclaimer: Educational use only. Not financial advice.
